languages.text: "Теодора пересекла черту ради забытых сокровищ Простора. Разве нам, Вольным Торговцам, не надлежит развеивать тайны космоса?"

traits.locale_text: Теодора была молодец, ковала железо пока горячо
"Теодора пересекла черту ради забытых сокровищ Простора. Разве нам, Вольным Торговцам, не надлежит развеивать тайны космоса?"

languages.text: "Theodora crossed the line for the sake of the forgotten treasures of the Expanse. Isn't that what we Rogue Traders are supposed to do? Unveil the mysteries of the cosmos?"
languages.original_text: "Теодора пересекла черту ради забытых сокровищ Простора. Разве нам, Вольным Торговцам, не надлежит развеивать тайны космоса?"

traits.locale_text: "Theodora crossed the line for the sake of Koronus' forgotten treasures. Are we Rogue Traders not supposed to go forth beyond the sacred borders?"
"Theodora crossed the line for the sake of Koronus' forgotten treasures. Are we Rogue Traders not supposed to go forth beyond the sacred borders?"
"Theodora crossed the line for the sake of the forgotten treasures of the Koronus. Isn't that what we Rogue Traders are supposed to do? Unveil the mysteries of the cosmos?"
"Theodora crossed the line for the sake of the forgotten treasures of the Koronus. Isn't that what we Rogue Traders are supposed to do? Unveil the mysteries of the cosmos?"
"Theodora crossed the line for the sake of the forgotten treasures of the Expanse. Isn't that what we Rogue Traders are supposed to do? Unveil the mysteries of the cosmos?"
